html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-13702022-12-16,  ,  ,  TC, 
ActCanadian Air Transport Security Authority Act
PrecisAmendment to Order in Council P.C. 2018-0148 of February 21, 2018, by replacing “for a term of two years” with “for a term of five years”; and designation of MELISSA LEIGH COULSON, to be Chairperson of the Canadian Air Transport Security Authority, on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on February 20, 2023 or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, whichever occurs first.
AttachmentsAttachment
act: Canadian Air Transport Security Authority Act
precis: Amendment to Order in Council P.C. 2018-0148 of February 21, 2018, by replacing “for a term of two years” with “for a term of five years”; and designation of MELISSA LEIGH COULSON, to be Chairperson of the Canadian Air Transport Security Authority, on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term ending on February 20, 2023 or until such time as a new Chairperson is appointed, whichever occurs first.
